meanings.definition: The quality or state of being disreputable.
meanings.sent1: His disreputableness was evident to everyone in town.
meanings.sent2: The disreputableness of the company's actions led to a loss of customers.
meanings.sent3: Despite his disreputableness, he always managed to charm his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The disreputableness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over them.
meanings.sent5: The disreputableness of the old building added to its mysterious allure.

meanings.definition: The condition of lacking a good reputation.
meanings.sent1: The disreputableness of the neighborhood made it a less desirable place to live.
meanings.sent2: She worked hard to overcome the disreputableness that had been unfairly attached to her name.
meanings.sent3: The disreputableness of the rumor mill in the office was both amusing and frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The disreputableness of the situation was like a stain that couldn't be washed away.
meanings.sent5: The disreputableness of his past haunted him wherever he went.
